section.p: DICOM Template 2000 specifies that Imaging Report Elements of Value Type Code are contained in sections. The Imaging Report Elements are inferred from Basic Diagnostic Imaging Report Observations that consist of image references and measurements (linear, area, volume, and numeric). Coded DICOM Imaging Report Elements in this context are mapped to CDA-coded observations that are section components and are related to the SOP Instance Observations (templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.8) or Quantity Measurement Observations (templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.14) by the SPRT (Support) act relationship.

ol.li: Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode, where its data type is ActClassObservation
Contains exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, where its data type is x_ActMoodDocumentObservation
Contains exactly one [1..1] code, where its data type is CD
